column4: when speaking about regex, you should always define the tool you are using regex with (sed, perl, python, ...), some more context would probably help too, finally you might get more answers in #regex which is dedicated to those questions
It is within a bash script - is that what you are asking about?
no ... and llutz_ answer is more appropriate ... you don't need regex for what you describe
the ansvar llutz gave me is exactly what I was looking for (thanks llutz).
